title: two.
lines: little bird, her darling
My girlfriend has a bird.

(sometimes when she plays with you
    she suddenly holds you tight to her breast
I just – I know, I know, but it’s the cutest fucking thing, you guys – and you should see it, he’s smart, he sits on her lap like a dog,

or sticks out a finger—oo, you little rascal
    you peck, go on do it again harder, oo

and it bites her, like tiny unharmful bites,
and she lets him,

that's when my (how I wish I were with her
        she's so beautiful
    feels preciously a little gay
    (longing perhaps she thinks of me
    and this helps make it easier to bear

and it's working so much better
than when I try to tell a joke
when she's crying

as when passion heavy flames
        and then, dies, down
(which never works)

I'd like to play with you the way she does
    and soothe within my heart the ache of love

The bird is the best fucking boyfriend I have ever seen.
Watching them, I was Atalanta, running and then not-running, grateful for the excuse to slow down

I like it as much as they say
that girl quick-footed liked
the little old golden apple
that untied the sash
she'd kept fastened so long
(My girlfriend has a BIRD, you guys, IT’S SO GODDAMN CUTE, and I am learning when to keep my mouth closed.)

title: three.
lines:
weep, Venus; Cupid, weep
weep everyone who loves nice things

My girlfriend’s bird died.
My girlfriend’s bird died, oh man,

the little bird is dead, her bird,
the little bird, the darling, hers
she loved it more than anything else in the world
she loved that little bird like eyes

it was a sweet little thing
why it knew her-they were maid and mother, like.

that girl-delighting bird
that never flew out of lap-bounds,

it used to stay on her lap, never tried to get away
it hopped around (there it goes! no, it's going over this way!)
just perched and tilting-hopped on my girlfriend the tree.

she was its mistress, it sang for her
and not ever for anybody else.
now it's going along the dark, scary road
down there

And man, fuck this, fuck darkness,
fuck the underworld, fuck not-returning, fuck laps,

and nobody comes back from there, they say.
well, damn you anyway, damned night of hell
anything that's pretty you just have to gulp it down,
 don't you?
congratulations, Death, on your impressive victory over a little brown bird that made her happy,

such a pretty little bird
just had to grab it, didn't you?
it's just too damned bad.
O birdie, birdie, birdie, see what you've done to her
fucking big shot, big ups to you and your dread arm for making her cry all afternoon, well done there.

she's crying, they're all swollen and red
her lovely eyes.
